wikistories-extensionname: Text for the name of the project
wikistories-extensiondesc: Text for the general project description
wikistories-hooks-createstory: Text for creating a story button used in the Wikipedia article view header
wikistories-specialcreatestory-title: Title of the special page to create a story.
wikistories-specialcreatestory-loading: Temporary message indicating that the story builder is currently loading on Special:CreateStory
wikistories-specialcreatestory-nojswarni: Message indicating that JavaScript is required to use Special:CreateStory
wikistories-search-inputplaceholder: Text used as placeholder for the input bar in Search view
wikistories-search-cuetext: Message shown when no search input has been provided by user in Search view
wikistories-search-noresultstext: Message shown when no results are found for user input in Search view
wikistories-story-goto-publish:
Text for a button in the Story view to continue to publish step
{{identical|Next}}
wikistories-story-selecttext: Text used for an text selection button in the CurrentFrame view
wikistories-story-editdone: Text used for a done selection button in the CurrentFrame view when editing story text
wikistories-imageattribution-author-unkn: Text used in the ImageAttribution component when the image author is unknown
wikistories-article-cancelselection:
Text for cancel button used in the Article view
{{identical|Cancel}}
wikistories-article-loading: Text used for a header in the Article view as the article loads
wikistories-article-usetext: Text used for a button in the Article view.
wikistories-article-info-banner: Text used for the info section in the Article view as the feature introduction
wikistories-article-info-expanded-banner:
Text used for the info section in the Article view as the extended feature introduction.

"Add to story" is {{msg-mw|Wikistories-article-usetext}}
wikistories-navigator-next:
Text for a button in the Navigator component to continue to next step
{{identical|Next}}
wikistories-alert-okbuttontext: Text of the OK button on the generic alert dialog.
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-title: Title for the confirm dialog to delete a story page in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-message: Text message for the confirm dialog to delete a story page in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-accept:
Text for the button to confirm deleting a story page in Story view.

{{Identical|Delete}}
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-cancel:
Text for the button to cancel deleting a story page in Story view
{{Identical|Cancel}}
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-title: Title of the error dialog when trying to publish a story that doesn't have enough frames.
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-messag:
Error message when trying to publish a story that doesn't have enough frames.

Parameters:
* $1 - minimum number of pages for a story
* $2 - number of pages missing
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-titl: Title of the error dialog when trying to publish a story that is missing text in some pages.
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-mess:
Error message when trying to publish a story that is missing text in some pages.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of pages without text
wikistories-builder-publishform-header: Title of the story publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-placehol: Placeholder of the story title text input on the publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-publishb: Text of the publish button on the publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-info: Information section about where will the published story be available.
wikistories-builder-publishform-invalidt: Error message when no story title is provided on the publish form.
Error message when the provided story title is invalid.
Error message when trying to create a story with a title that already exists.
wikistories-builder-publishform-saveerro: An error occured when publishing the story. Please try again later.
wikistories-discover-cta-text: Text for a button in the Discover section to start the builder step
wikistories-storyviewer-next-story-butto: Text for the button when press and go to the next story viewer
